name: Remake of "Very low quality sPaCe game"
name_original: Remake of "Very low quality sPaCe game"
description:
This game is a remake of this shitpost that my friend make. When I saw it at the first time I thought it was horrible, but then I realised that it had really goods ideas so I decide it to make it again, but making it playable and "fun to play".

The game has better graphics, controls, difficulty management but, it doesn't have history. In the rest of things is the same.

I strongly recomend first playing the original game and then this one.
https://mr-powder.itch.io/very-low-quality-space-game
